titlestmt.subtitle: Records of Anthony Boucher Memorial Mystery Convention (Bouchercon), 1970-2019, at the Lilly Library, Indiana University
titlestmt.author: Ava Dickerson

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-02-18 22:32:27 -0500.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: The Bouchercon mss., 1970-2019, consist of program books, badges, tote bags, and other materials associated with The Anthony Boucher Memorial Mystery Convention (Bouchercon).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.
Many collections are housed offsite; retrieval requires advance notice. Please make an appointment a minimum of one week in advance of your visit.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Photography and digitization may be restricted for some collections. Copyright restrictions may apply. Before publishing, researchers are responsible for securing permission from all applicable rights holders, then filling out the Permission to Publish form.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Beginning in 1970 in Santa Monica, California, the Anthony Boucher Memorial Mystery Convention (Bouchercon) is an annual mystery convention held in honor of author Anthony Boucher.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of materials related to Bouchercons, occurring annually from 1970-present. For each convention year, there is some combination of the following: souvenir programs, pocket programs, tote bags, short story anthologies, name badges, and ephemera including Anthony Award ballots, convention progress reports, menus, schedules, advertisements, and bookmarks.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Bouchercon mss., Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Initial collection processed by Kyra Triebold in 2023. Accrues regularly.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: See the Mystery Writers of America mss. and the White mss., also located at the Lilly Library, Indiana University, Bloomington, Indiana.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: Short story anthologies for the years 2014 through 2019 were separated from the collection and may be found by searching IUCAT.
